FROM ubuntu:12.04 MAINTAINER Dan Sosedoff "dan.sosedoff@gmail.com"

Update system

RUN apt-get update -y RUN apt-get upgrade -y

Setup SSH server

RUN apt-get install -y openssh-server RUN mkdir /var/run/sshd

Start SSH server

CMD /usr/sbin/sshd -D

EXPOSE 22 docker run -p 42222:22 VBoxManage modifyvm "boot2docker-vm" --natpf1 "containerssh,tcp,,42222,,42222"
